ok... caffeine is a simple alkaloid... available from plants of various types... notably coffee and tea and... chocolate
extraction from plants is fairly easy... this will work with most alkaloids
with coffee beans
grind to a fine powder... I'm usually working with a hundred milliliters... nice round number... add 1 CC of pickling lime... slaked lime.. available on Amazon for making pickles with... this brings the ph up to about 9... mas o menos... add a little more if you want.. too much destroys the other alkaloids... and they are actually good for us so I want all of them... cover with acetone and mix well.... let it pickle overnight.. the lime breaks down the plant material but a fairly low pH won't modify the mixture... pour off the acetone and evaporate... with vacuum is best but it's not necessary for good results... the remaining powder is the business part of coffee... au naturel

EASY way to extract caffeine from caffeine pills:
Caffeine is highly soluble in boiling water, while the fillers and binding agents are not.
So.
1. crush up caffeine pills
2. dissolve in boiling water
3. filter out fillers and binding agents with a coffee filter
4. boil away water from resulting solution in a frying pan
5. turn on camera and say, "this is your brain on drugs"
6. or you'll be living in a VAN DOWN BY THE RIVER!

Good for large volumes, obvs not super useful for small batches
